ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : 0 < a H2 : 0 < b H3 : 0 < a * a - b * b Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1840 * ?M1840 - ?M1841 * ?M1841) = Lt" with "(0 ?= a - b) = Lt".

ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : 0 < a H2 : 0 < b H : 0 < a * a Unable to unify "0 < a * a" with "- (a - b) < 0".

ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "b * b < 0" on hypothesis of type "0 < a".

original: intros a b H1 H2 H3. unfold Z.sub. apply Zlt_0_minus_lt. apply sqr_sub2. - apply Z.opp_neg_pos. apply Z.sub_pos_cases in H3. destruct H3. * apply H. * apply H in H1. omega. - apply H2. - apply H3.
